price: Yã Banĩ Isrã'ĩla! Lalle Mun tsẽrar da ku daga maƙiyinku, kuma mun yi muku wa'adi a gẽfen Dũtsen nan na dãma, kuma Mun sassaukar da darɓa da tattabaru dõminku.
arabic: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَوَٰعَدۡنَٰكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yābanī is'rāīla qad anjaynākum min ʿaduwwikum wawāʿadnākum jāniba al-ṭūri al-aymana wanazzalnā ʿalaykumu al-mana wal-salwā
translations: and We made a covenant with you
